data.text: @adamhlavac Absolutely, and it's good to vent some steam from time to time. I hope your relatives in Czechoslovakia are o.k., despite the awful circumstances in Ukraine and the many refugees. I'm devasted what's happening there.
@The_Foksuh I’m so sorry. I can’t imagine
@adamhlavac Same bro @adamhlavac but I wish you have a bless day to you and everyone 😇

@adamhlavac Living right by the Russian border, just 18 miles away, you can imagine the existential crisis I'm having right now.
..luckily I've had this week off from work.
@adamhlavac You deserve the best so I hope you feel better ❤️‍🩹

@adamhlavac Yeah, it’s not just days at this point. Few years of pandemic already made me constantly tired and depressed. And now Russians destroying cities of my neighbors and basically leading to genocide is not helping. Wish it could just end and everyone’s safe…
@adamhlavac Its been a ROUGH weekend to week for me as well... hoping you find some peace of mind today. 👍 take it easy.
@adamhlavac We all do. And I think a lot of us of late can relate. It is okay not to be okay!
